testcase.name: log-in-Password should be masked
testcase.system-out: Given user go to "http://practice.automationtesting.in/"....................passed When user click on My Account Menu..........................................passed Then user enter the password field with some characters.....................passed Then The password field should display the characters in asterisks..........passed And user close driver.......................................................passed

testcase.name: log-in handles with case sensitive
testcase.system-out: Given user go to "http://practice.automationtesting.in/"....................passed When user click on My Account Menu..........................................passed Then user the case changed username in username textbox.....................passed Then the case chenged password in the password tetxbox......................passed Then user click on login button.............................................passed Then login must fail saying incorrect username and password.................passed And user close driver.......................................................passed
